reviews.text: We spent one night at the Residence Inn and were surprised by how lovely the hotel was. Check in was quick and easy and when we opened the door to our room - a suite with a king sized bed, we couldn't believe how nice the room was. The decor was very attractive and the room was quite spacious. The bed was comfortable and we were happy that we could swivel the flat screen tv to face the bed and away from the living room area where we had our baby's crib set up. The complimentary breakfast was wonderful - a make your own belgian waffle station and plenty of other hot food options. We also spent the morning in the indoor pool which was clean and warm and very enjoyable. My only complaint was a little bit of noise -you could very clearly hear someone cursing and yelling at someone else through the vent in our bathroom. Also, our room overlooked the courtyard area, and there were a bunch of kids out there until at least 11:00pm. They were just talking and laughing, but the sound really echoed.
reviews.title: Would definitely stay again

likes.liked: — Attractive decor, great breakfast, comfortable large bed

reviews.title: Home away from Home, very nice
reviews.text: We booked online before leaving home, stayed in a king size suite, with plenty of room, flat queen LG Tv, probably about 42 inches. Upon arrival, desk top was very friendly and helpful, hubby said he was given bottled water. Everything looked brandnew and worked good. I felt safe & also would have no problem staying there a few days, nice eating area, seating area.
My husband has a bad knee & we were able to obtain a good
reviews.title: Great new hotel – almost better than home!
Brand spanking new.
reviews.text: handicapped parking in the front. It was a Sat night, so a lot of

We stayed in a two bedroom unit. The unit was clean and the kitchen had plenty of dishes, pots and pans. The ice maker did not work in the freezer so we had to go to the front desk for ice. The living area had a couch but no chair. There was plenty of room for a chair I just think it was missing from our room.
reviews.title: Comfortable room for a family
Couldn't be happier with our stay!
reviews.text: The breakfast was the standard stuff served at Residence Inn. There was plenty of tables to sit and eat in the breakfast area. They also had table set up outside.

We really enjoyed our stay at this property. The front desk personnel were very friendly and welcoming. The public areas were very clean and well maintained. Our suite was everything we could want, and the beds were comfy. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
reviews.title: comfortable family stay

reviews.text: We spent 1 night here and it was very comfortable. Easy to get to, friendly staff. They have a nice large pool, hot tub, a small gym and an outdoor basketball court -a bonus which my boys loved. They have balls we can borrow at the front desk. They had fresh choc.chip cookies in the lobby when we checked in. The room was a studio so quite spacious. Things looked new and fresh.The breakfast nextday was included and excellent - fresh waffles, french toast, egg, sausage, toast, bagel, english muffin, oatmeal with tons of toppings, fresh fruit, yogurt, milk, cereal,cottage cheese, muffins, coffee and juice.
reviews.title: Our only place to stay in Dover
No or Very Limited Managers Reception No Ice
reviews.text: My sister lives nearby and we always stay at the Residence Inn at Dover because we can't find a better deal or place! We stay in a 2 bedroom suite and marvel at the space and value. Although they only have dinner receptions a few nights a week, they always provide a very generously supplied breakfast buffet which includes eggs, potatoes, sausages, waffles (made by you-to order!) breads, muffins, yogurts, etc. We are impressed with the spread and did I mention the value? I live in Manhattan and I am used to paying more than I should have to...so, it is awfully nice to get so much at such a reasonable rate. The rooms are clean, the internet service is faster than many hotels and the staff is friendly and helpful.
